## Launch your SaaS in days, not months

This isn't just another template - it's a complete SaaS foundation with authentication, payments, dashboard, and everything you need to validate and scale your subscription business.

<div className="grid gap-4 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 my-8">

## Everything for your SaaS

This template includes everything you need to launch a modern SaaS application. Save months of development time with a battle-tested foundation that scales from prototype to production.

## Getting Started

<Steps>
  <Step>Install dependencies</Step>
  ```bash
  pnpm install
  ```

  <Step>Set up your environment variables</Step>
  ```bash
  cp .env.example .env.local
  ```
  Configure your database, authentication providers, and Stripe keys in `.env.local`.

  <Step>Set up your database</Step>
  ```bash
  pnpm db:push
  ```

  <Step>Start the development server</Step>
  ```bash
  pnpm dev
  ```

  <Step>Configure Stripe webhooks</Step>
  Set up webhooks in your Stripe dashboard to handle subscription events and billing updates.

  <Step>Deploy to production</Step>
  Deploy to Vercel, Railway, or your preferred platform with the included deployment configurations.
</Steps>

<Note>
  <strong>Ready to scale:</strong> This template includes everything from authentication to payments, making it perfect for validating your SaaS idea and scaling to thousands of users.
</Note>
